title: Opeth: Converse x Decibel Collaboration
description: In the latest Converse X Decibel Collaboration we go record shopping with Mikael Akerfeldt of Opeth as he discusses his passion for record collecting and the influence this has had on him as a musician and the evolution of Opeth's sound over the past twenty years.
